snippet.title: Sinner 97 - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Increasingly disturbing rumours surrounding a local cult are circulating, with more and more unbelievable and horrifying stories coming to light. The recent disappearance of a local child, compounded with an ineffective and disinterested police force, have left you, a town local, no choice but to find a way into the leaders (Father's) secretive “compound”.

We hope you enjoy our free prologue! We are currently releasing on Steam Early Access 22nd September 2022!

Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2004370/Sinner_97/
Twitter - https://twitter.com/BubblegumHome
